ol.li: SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7569)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:7572, CONF:7573)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
If medication use is unknown, the appropriate nullFlavor MAY be present (see unknown information in Section 1)
SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7569)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:7795, CONF:7573)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:7572, CONF:7573)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
If medication use is unknown, the appropriate nullFlavor MAY be present (see unknown information in Section 1)
If medication use is unknown, the appropriate nullFlavor MAY be present (see unknown information in Section 1)
